page.title: 03Bridford Woods Heltor D'moor
page.content: {Bridford Woods,}located on the south side of the{B3212}road that runs through the southeast corner of the 4 x 3 km block, has numerous nature trails and is mainly{National Trust property and open to the public. A {bridle path}follows a gentle incline through the woods and farmland southwards to{Heltor Rock. }The woods are mainly deciduous and cover several acres on both sides of the B3212 road. Information about the area can be obtained from the Dartmoor National Park Information Centre situated at Steps Bridge.
